July 1, 2021

Dear Parents,

Welcome to our 2020-2021 Crosspoint Academy family! I am looking forward to a blessed year with you and your children! Please take time to review the important information below regarding the school year. Also take some time to look at our web page to find out more information about our programs in general and download a calendar for the upcoming school year. If you have any question or concerns, please don’t hesitate to contact us.

Blessings,

Lauren McElroy, Crosspoint Academy Director
(850) 678-4411, ext. 187
lmcelroy@crosspoint.church
School Wide Information

Tuition

As stated in the handbook, tuition is an annual fee divided into equal monthly payments. These monthly payments are due on the 1st day of each month starting July 1. Automatic debit payments will be drafted on the 1st working day of each month. Late fees will be assessed after the 10th. If any payment is returned, a $30 return fee will be assessed.

2020-2021 Childcare Monthly Tuition
2 Days | $275
3 Days | $400
5 Days | $775

2020-2021 Preschool Monthly Tuition
2 Days | $275
3 Days | $375 (4-year rate with VPK Voucher: $0)
5 Days | $485 (4-year rate with VPK Voucher: $230)
Extended Care | $340

The Crosspoint Academy Handbook is now available. Please click on the link to review all our guidelines and procedures.

Health Forms

An up-to-date Florida Immunization Form (DH3040) and Florida Physical Form (DH680) were due May 31. If you have not already, please bring these in as soon as possible. Click here to view samples of these forms.
Your doctor must fill out the actual forms.

Unexpected Closures & Delayed Start Times

We will send emails and texts concerning unexpected closures or delayed start times whenever possible. We will also update the web page and/or Facebook as we can so you can plan accordingly for upcoming closures/delayed start times.

For closures due to inclement weather, please follow Okaloosa County School District’s plan for closures and delayed start times.

 

 

Drop-Off & Pick-Up Times
 Full-time Childcare
7:30 a.m. & 5:30 p.m.

Part-time Childcare
9:30 a.m. & 2:00 p.m.

Preschool
9:00 a.m. & 2:30 p.m.

Preschool Extended Care
7:30 a.m. & 5:30 p.m.

Preschool Information

VPK Information
If your 4-year-old will be participating in the VPK program, vouchers were due July 1. We are currently waiting on our yearly VPK approval, though we expect to finalize our contract in the next few weeks. If you have not done so already, go to the Florida Office of Early Learning web page for more information and to secure your child's VPK voucher.

If we have not received your child's VPK voucher by July 1, the full tuition amount will need to be paid via cash or check. 5-day students will be notified once the remaining portion VPK does not cover has been determined.

 

T-Shirts & Totes
All preschool classes (3- and 4-year) are
required to wear Crosspoint Academy
t-shirts daily. For pricing or to purchase shirts, go to the Eagles Nest webpage. You can also purchase them in the store at 1534 John Sims Parkway East (Publix Shopping Center). All 4-year-old VPK students will receive 2 free t-shirts (royal blue and lime green) at Open House.

Preschool students are given a tote at Open House. This tote is to be used daily and any belongings your child would like to bring for the day should fit within it.

Extended Care
If your preschooler will be with us before or after the normal school day (9-2:30), welcome to the extended care family! Please check out our welcome letter for important information about our Extended Care program as well as a schedule so you and your child know what to expect.

 

If you wish to unsubscribe, please email info@crosspoint.church or call 850-678-4411.
